dishes.name: Roast Pork Sandwich
dishes.description: Tender, oven-roasted pork shoulder, usually shaved or chopped, gets layered with melted sharp provolone cheese and garlicky saut√©ed broccoli rabies. Watch out for the foaming mouth!
reviews: I can make these with my eyes closed
John's Roast Pork is the best place to get one of these!

dishes.name: Philly Soft Pretzels
dishes.description: A favorite local snack introduced by German settlers centuries ago.
reviews: Not great for a meal but perfect for a snack

dishes.name: Tomato Pie
dishes.description: Made with thick, focaccia-like dough, fresh tomato sauce and sometimes a hint of grated Romano cheese.
